dict.string:
on alfred_script(q)
if q starts with "cd " then set target to ((characters 4 thru -1 of filename) as string) --trim first 3 do shell script "/opt/homebrew/bin/alacritty --working-directory=" & target else set prevClipboard to the clipboard set the clipboard to q
tell application "Alacritty" to activate tell application "System Events" -- Alacritty's process name is lowercased repeat while (name of first application process whose frontmost is true) is not "alacritty" delay 0.1 end repeat delay 0.1 keystroke "v" using {command down} delay 0.1 key code 36 end tell
set the clipboard to prevClipboard end if
end alfred_script
